Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Authorizes Paul Nehrich to be considered a veteran for real property taxation purposes
Summary: Authorizes Paul Nehrich to be considered a "veteran" for real property taxation purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Paul Nehrich to be considered a "veteran" for real property taxation purposes
